name: 150 in 1 - Solitaire
description:
All the best & most popular solitaire card games in one place.

FEATURES
- 150 Free Games
- Addicting gameplay
- Auto-complete moves option
- Favorite games option
- Fully detailed statistics
- Game seed assignment option
- Game rules supplied
- Handy Undo function
- Superb graphics and animation
- Supports Game Center for highest scores worldwide
Simply the best FREE Solitaire experience for your iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.

If you love windows Solitaire but want something with a little more class, this is the app for you!
